summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ZLECAf Dashboard dynamic widgets. All 5 widgets (Live Trade Stats, Live Ports, LSCI Index, Country Profile, AfCFTA Progress) are fetching real-time data from backend APIs correctly. Language switching (FR/EN) works for all widget titles. Drag-and-drop customization feature is functional with add/remove/reset capabilities.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard dynamic widgets are fully functional. All API endpoints verified: /api/statistics (trade evolution, top exporters/importers), /api/statistics/unctad/ports (28.5M TEU throughput), /api/statistics/unctad/lsci (11 African countries), /api/country-profile/DZ (Algeria profile). Language switching updates all widget titles correctly. Customization mode allows adding/removing widgets with drag-and-drop reordering.

Returns 54 countries with English names
